INNIL.ExperimentalElixirBoundedWarning: You must pick between 1 and {max} options.
INNIL.ExperimentalElixirExpendedSlots: {name} expended a {level} spell slot and created an elixir.
INNIL.ExperimentalElixirTypeAlacrity: You add a 1d8 bonus to initiative rolls for 1 minute.
INNIL.ExperimentalElixirTypeBoldness: You add a 1d4 bonus to attack rolls and saving throws for 1 minute.
INNIL.ExperimentalElixirTypeFlight: You have a flying speed of 10 feet for 10 minutes.
INNIL.ExperimentalElixirTypeResilience: You add a +1 bonus to AC for 10 minutes.
INNIL.ExperimentalElixirTypeRestorativeR: The drinker gains 2d6 + {mod} temporary hit points.
INNIL.ExperimentalElixirTypeSwiftness: Your walking speed increases by 10 feet for 1 hour.
INNIL.ExperimentalElixirTypeTransformati: The drinker's body is transformed as if by the Alter Self spell. The drinker determines the transformation caused by the spell, the effects of which last for 10 minutes.
INNIL.ExperimentalElixirNoSpellSlot: You do not have a spell slot available to create an elixir with this number of effects.
INNIL.ExperimentalElixirPickAtLeastOne: You must pick at least one effect.
INNIL.SettingsColorItemAttunedHint: The color of the attunement icon when attuned to an item.
INNIL.SettingsColorItemNotAttunedHint: The color of the attunement icon when not attuned to an item.
INNIL.SettingsColorShowLimitedUsesHint: Create colored dots on the sheet for items with limited uses.
INNIL.SettingsColorShowSpellSlotsHint: Create colored dots on the sheet for spell slots.
INNIL.SettingsColorSpellAlwaysPreparedHi: The color of the prepared icon when a spell is permanently prepared.
INNIL.SettingsColorSpellNotPreparedHint: The color of the prepared icon when a spell is not prepared.
INNIL.SettingsColorSpellPreparedHint: The color of the prepared icon when a spell is prepared.
INNIL.SettingsColorUsesUnexpendedHint: The color of available limited uses and spell slots.
INNIL.SettingsCombatantDefeatedHint: When combatants that are not owned by a player is reduced to 0 or less hp, mark them as defeated.
INNIL.SettingsDisplayAmmoHint: If ammunition has a saving throw, it will be displayed when a weapon makes an attack roll.
INNIL.SettingsMenuColorSettingsHint: Settings for the colors that are applied to the actor sheets.
INNIL.SettingsMenuRarityColorsHint: Settings for the colors that are applied to items on an actor sheet depending on rarity.
INNIL.SettingsMenuWorldSettingsHint: A collection of additions and replacements for core and system content.
INNIL.SettingsTrackReactionsHint: Track reactions for combatants when combat is ongoing.
INNIL.SettingsWorldAddConditionsHint: An addition to current available conditions.
INNIL.SettingsWorldAddEquipmentHint: An addition to current available equipment types. Not armor.
INNIL.SettingsWorldAddPietyHint: Adds 'Piety' as a new ability score and 'Divine Boon' as a feature type.
INNIL.SettingsWorldCollapsibleHeadersHin: Make headers collapsible on actor sheets.
INNIL.SettingsWorldCreateMoneySpenderHin: Create a 'Spend Money' button on the sheet.
INNIL.SettingsWorldRemoveAlignmentHint: Remove the Alignment field from character sheets.
INNIL.SettingsWorldReplaceConsumablesHin: Replace the selection of available consumable types.
INNIL.SettingsWorldReplaceLanguagesHint: Replace the selection of available languages.
INNIL.SettingsWorldReplaceTokenCondition: Replace the core conditions on the token HUD.
INNIL.SettingsWorldReplaceToolsHint: Replace the selection of available tools.
INNIL.SettingsWorldReplaceWeaponsHint: Replace the selection of available weapons. Also gets rid of firearm-specific weapon attributes.
INNIL.StatusConditionExhaustionDescripti: You have a −{level} penalty to your attack rolls, saving throws, ability checks, and spell save DC. If your level of exhaustion exceeds 10, you die. When you finish a long rest, you may remove one level of exhaustion.
INNIL.StatusConditionReactionDescription: You have spent your reaction on {name}. You cannot take another reaction until the start of your next turn.
